pages.text: $(item)Altars$() are lectern-like objects made of a mundane material, from stone to coral to blackstone, adorned with candles and inlaid with $(l:miskatonicmysteries:world/oceanic_gold)$(item)Oceanic Gold$().$(br)Altars are used to hold this book or similar grimoires, in order to provide special knowledge for certain $(l:miskatonicmysteries:rites/rite_intro)$(marked)Rites$().
